name: Balázs Ilsinszki
title: Principal Product Manager
bio: Balázs Ilsinszki is a Principal Product Manager at Bitrise, focusing on DevOps, CI/CD, and large-scale release processes. He has led major infrastructure transitions such as migrating customers to Apple Silicon build machines and delivering faster, more reliable environments for mobile developers. With over a decade of experience across engineering and product leadership, Balázs is passionate about building developer-focused solutions that scale efficiently and improve delivery speed.
session_titles: Accelerating Mobile Development with Bitrise CI/CD on EC2 Mac
